Title: Creates a private right of action for the breach of a consumer's identifying information
Summary: Relates to creating a private right of action for the breach of a consumer's identifying information such as their social security number, driver's license number, bank account number, credit or debit card number, personal identification number, automated or electronic signature, unique biometric data, account passwords or other information that can be used to access an individual's financial accounts or to obtain goods and services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to creating a private right of action for the breach of a consumer's identifying information
